message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's start fair, but I'll take the lion's share.
You're not as generous as you thought, are you? I'll take the majority this time.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. 60/40 split seems fair, considering we both have a chance to reject and things only get worse from here.
I'll take a bit more, but I'm willing to give you a decent chunk. Don't expect it to get any better from here.
Bob, we're both losing money with every round. Let's split it 40/60 this time, or else we risk getting very little in the end.
